title: The Beast at Killing Town
itunes:title: The Beast at Killing Town
description:
Vinny’s back home and ready to talk about time spent on the infernal bunny slope, our ongoing time with Tunic, Elden Ring, Norco and more, the Max Payne remake(s), Sony’s billion-dollar Epic investment, a fourth (?!) Kingdom Hearts, and Randy Pitchford’s magical real estate moves.

Advertise on The Nextlander Podcast at Gumball.fm, or support us on Patreon!

CHAPTERS

(00:00:10) Intro
(00:01:30) Going away in the world today takes everything you've got
(00:05:51) Shredding that fresh corn
(00:11:53) Is skiing and/or snowboarding only for the chosen elites?
(00:15:25) Brad's new shoes
(00:16:00) Alex has been getting up to some writing and movie screenings!
(00:21:40) The Games
(00:22:26) Tunic [Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), Mac, Xbox One] on Mar 16, 2022
(00:33:43) First Break
(00:33:52) Norco [PC (Microsoft Windows), Mac] on Mar 24, 2022
(00:38:42) Horizon Forbidden West [PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4] on Feb 18, 2022
(00:41:02) Elden Ring [PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 5] on Feb 25, 2022
(00:50:19) Second Break
(00:50:23) The News
(00:50:44) Kingdom Hearts 4 is coming!
(00:57:32) Max Payne 1 & 2 are returning!
(01:07:11) More Activision news
(01:12:52) Sony needs to update something... somewhere!
(01:18:00) Sony also needs to explain why it is spending money on the Metaverse
(01:26:31) The Ghost of Tsuhima movie has a writer
(01:29:36) Randy Pitchford purchases a magic house
(01:35:23) Wrapping up and thanks
(01:38:03) Mysterious Benefactor Tier Shoutouts
(01:39:39) Keep smiling!
(01:40:14) See ya!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
